document_data.name: Roderik
document_data.mainbody: '''Roderik''' was a member of the [[Night Parade]] who died while fighting a group of [[Harpers]] in [[Calimport]].
document_data.Description: Roderik appeared as a dark, featureless [[human]] whose skin seemed to absorb light and reflect shadows.
document_data.Abilities: He could walk through shadows. Additionally, what he touched would become coated in tar-like darkness that killed whoever touched it. As a member of the Inextinguishables, he was difficult to kill by normal means.
document_data.Activities: Roderik was a member of the Night Parade, in particular a member of Lord [[Zeal]]'s elite Inextinguishables force.
document_data.History: In {{Yearlink|1359}}, Roderik and his fellow Inextinguishables were active in Calimport, where they attacked the Harper [[Myrmeen Lhal]] and her companions. The fight went poorly, and ended when Lord Zeal killed the Inextinguishables for their failure.
